title: US-1.1: Sign Up with Email and OAuth
body:
As a user, I want to sign up with email or OAuth so I can create an account.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Email/password and Google OAuth supported.
- Success/failure messages shown.

title: US-1.2: Secure Login
body:
As a user, I want to log in securely so I can access my personal library.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Secure token-based auth
- Session maintained across app restarts.

title: US-1.3: Persistent Login
body:
As a user, I want to remain logged in on my device until I log out.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Auth token stored securely
- Auto-login on app reopen.

title: US-2.1: Upload Book Files
body:
As a user, I want to upload a PDF, ePub, or Mobi file to read.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Only valid formats allowed
- Upload progress and confirmation shown.

title: US-2.2: View Book Library
body:
As a user, I want to view a list of uploaded books.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- List view with title, author, format, cover image.

title: US-2.3: Organize Books into Folders
body:
As a user, I want to delete or move books into folders.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Folder creation
- Book move/delete with confirmation

title: US-3.1: Open and Read a Book
body:
As a user, I want to open any supported book format to read.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Viewer loads file correctly
- Supports .pdf, .epub, .mobi

title: US-3.2: Toggle Reading Modes
body:
As a user, I want to switch between long-scroll and book-flip mode.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Toggle in UI
- Persists per book

title: US-3.3: Customize Font
body:
As a user, I want to change font size and style.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Font options applied instantly
- Saves preference to profile

title: US-3.4: Switch Reading Theme
body:
As a user, I want to change the theme (light, dark, sepia).

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Theme applies instantly
- Saves to user profile

title: US-4.1: Highlight Text
body:
As a user, I want to highlight selected text.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Saves color, position, and snippet
- Highlights visible in reader

title: US-4.2: Add Notes to Highlights
body:
As a user, I want to add notes to highlights.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Notes attach to existing highlights
- Editable text area

title: US-4.3: Comment Anywhere
body:
As a user, I want to comment on any location.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Comments saved and displayed independently of highlights

title: US-4.4: Add Bookmarks
body:
As a user, I want to bookmark a page.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Bookmarks viewable and deletable
- Persisted per user/book

title: US-5.1: Sync Reading Progress
body:
As a user, I want my reading progress to sync across devices.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Position saved in cloud
- Restored after login

title: US-5.2: Sync Highlights and Notes
body:
As a user, I want highlights, comments, and bookmarks to sync across devices.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Full sync on app start/exit
- Offline edits queued

title: US-5.3: Sync Reader Preferences
body:
As a user, I want to retain my theme and font settings across devices.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Settings saved to account profile
- Applied on login
